data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
The instruction is for edging forward and backward. If you face forward, you always are facing forward. So, the answer is yes.
If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Take 4 steps. Turn around. Take 4 steps. Turn around. Turn right. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
If you turn around turn right and the start point is the starting point. So, the answer is Yes.

You need to turn around 2 times while you walk back to the starting point. You can take 6 to 4 steps, not enough to walk back to the starting point. So, the answer is no.

It will take you 7 steps to turn left. The first 7 steps is required before you can make the second step. If you take 7 steps to turn left, you need to go 7 steps to turn left. So, the answer is yes.
